# NFT Badger

## Contract Address Tracker

Sample 1 Ropsten:
> router: 0xefDc8C07d6D4C5C0A9Ce90dd40139299A3Da47f7
> factory: 0x5b786Eb7E275A6FeC3EF1B3C237276c0e9c40254

Sample Payload `createContractForClient`
